verses.roman:
'jaya gauracandra', jaya śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya'
ei-mata kolāhala loke dhanya dhanya

synonyms: jaya gauracandra—all glories to Gaurahari; jaya śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—all glories to Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ei-mata—in this way; kolāhala—a tumultuous sound; loke—people in general; dhanya dhanya—began to chant, "Wonderful, wonderful!"
translation: The crowd made a tumultuous vibration, chanting, "Jaya Gauracandra! Jaya Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya!" Then the people began to chant, "Wonderful! Wonderful!"
